select * from mesys_movie_detail
genres like CONCAT('%',#{moviePagePo.movieType},'%')
and countries like CONCAT('%',#{moviePagePo.area},'%')
and year ${moviePagePo.year}
order by ${moviePagePo.sortType} desc

select year(create_time) as year,MONTH(create_time) as month,count(1) as count from mesys_movie_detail where is_deleted = 0 group by year(create_time),MONTH(create_time) having CONCAT(year,LPAD(month,2,0)) BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startYear},LPAD(#{startMonth},2,0)) and CONCAT(#{endYear},LPAD(#{endMonth},2,0))
